name: Power-UP (itch) (D4vid_DG)
description:
For Mini-Jam #73 with the topic "Power". Made in 72 hours. 

Go through a mysterious dungeon using power-ups to avoid obstacles. Sometimes, power-ups can only be used in restricted directions. Solve puzzles using the correct power-ups in the restricted directions.

Made with: https://xorm.itch.io/

Thanks to:

VECTORPIXELSTAR

for the art assets. You can check them here: https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/1-bit-patterns-and-tiles
